name: Bucket Balls
description:
Become the newest pilot for the Mana Defence Force within the Inner City of Echo Tokyo. Can you keep the city functioning by collecting Mana and ensuring the collection devices remain at full power.

The game features a puzzle game element where you will have to control the cities guns to destroy pockets of Mana to rain from the sky and be collected by the correctly coloured Mana Collectors. Controlling the guns and collector positions simultaneously.

Featuring

  • Wave Based Puzzle Mechanic
  • Increasing Difficulty
  • Upgrades to purchase between waves
  • A Daily Puzzle with Leaderboards
  • Main Game Online Leaderboards
